sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT  TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
FROM (SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT IS NULL  
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 	     
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
	((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
	  + 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  <=  ( SELECT top 1 CAST(lov_val1 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CFG_LOV c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_CUSTOMER_NEW_OLD'' and lov_name = ''Existing'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )      
  AND ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE()+1) As Date) )
	  ) 
UNION ALL	  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg =''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )   
  AND  ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, (SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), B.BA_REGISTER_DT) As Date) )
	) 
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE())+1 As Date)  
UNION ALL  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,B.ACCNT_NO
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
INNER JOIN ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN C ON C.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM = B.ACCNT_NO AND C.REASON_SUBCODE IN(''1863'',''1864'') AND C.ACTION_DTM < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
)TEMP
GROUP BY TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
ORDER BY TEMP.ACCNT_NO;')

activities.name: If Billing Account List is empty

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.DATA_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''P'',''Process review send billing account count',activity('Get All BIlling Account').output.count,' records'');')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT  TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
FROM (SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT IS NULL  
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 	     
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
	((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
	  + 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  <=  ( SELECT top 1 CAST(lov_val1 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CFG_LOV c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_CUSTOMER_NEW_OLD'' and lov_name = ''Existing'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )      
  AND ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE()+1) As Date) )
	  ) 
UNION ALL	  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg =''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )   
  AND  ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, (SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), B.BA_REGISTER_DT) As Date) )
	) 
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE())+1 As Date)  
UNION ALL  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,B.ACCNT_NO
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
INNER JOIN ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN C ON C.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM = B.ACCNT_NO AND C.REASON_SUBCODE IN(''1863'',''1864'') AND C.ACTION_DTM < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
)TEMP
GROUP BY TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
ORDER BY TEMP.ACCNT_NO;')

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_RESPONSE_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ''',variables('fileName'),''',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ''',variables('fileSyncName'),''',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''= Create File : ',variables('fileName'),' success'' WHERE DATA_ID =',variables('dataId'),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',activity('create file output').Error.Message,''' WHERE DATA_ID =',variables('dataId'),';')

ifTrueActivities.name: insert when Billing Account List is empty

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''S'',''Query Billing account no for send billing account no to sff data not found'');')
